verses.verse: "Run back and forth<WH7751> through the streets<WH2351> of Jerusalem,<WH3389> and see<WH7200> now,<WH3045> and know, and seek<WH1245> in the broad places<WH7339> of it,<WH4672> if you can find a man,<WH376> if there are<WH3426> any who does<WH6213> justly,<WH4941> who seeks<WH1245> truth;<WH530> and I will pardon her.<WH5545>
Though they say,<WH559> <WH3068> 'As Yahweh lives;<WH2416>' surely they swear<WH7650> falsely.<WH8267>"

O Yahweh,<WH3068> don't<WH5869> your eyes look on truth?<WH530> You have stricken<WH5221> them,<WH2342> but they were not grieved. You have consumed<WH3615> them,<WH3985> but they have refused to receive<WH3947> correction.<WH4148> They have made their faces<WH6440> harder<WH2388> than a rock.<WH5553> They have refused<WH3985> to return.<WH7725>
Then I said,<WH559> "Surely these are poor.<WH1800> They are foolish;<WH2973> for they don't<WH3045> know the way<WH1870> of Yahweh,<WH3068> nor the law<WH4941> of their God.<WH430>

I will go<WH3212> to the great men,<WH1419> and will speak<WH1696> to them;<WH3045> for they know the way<WH1870> of Yahweh,<WH3068> and the law<WH4941> of their God.<WH430>" But these with one accord<WH3162> have broken<WH7665> the yoke,<WH5923> and burst<WH5423> the bonds.<WH4147>

Therefore a lion<WH738> out of the forest<WH3293> shall kill<WH5221> them,<WH2061> a wolf of the evenings<WH6160> shall destroy<WH7703> them,<WH5246> a leopard shall watch<WH8245> against their cities;<WH5892> everyone who goes out<WH3318> there shall<WH2007> be torn in pieces;<WH2963> because their transgressions<WH6588> are many,<WH7231> and their backsliding<WH4878> is increased.<WH6105>

"How<WH335> can I pardon<WH5545> you?<WH2063> Your children<WH1121> have forsaken<WH5800> me,<WH7650> and sworn by what are no<WH3808> gods.<WH430> When I had fed them to the full,<WH7650> they committed adultery,<WH5003> and assembled themselves in troops<WH1413> at the prostitutes<WH2181>' houses.<WH1004>
They were as fed<WH2109> horses<WH5483> roaming at large:<WH7904> everyone<WH376> neighed<WH6670> after his neighbor<WH7453>'s wife.<WH802>
Shouldn't<WH6485> I punish them for these things?<WH5002>" says Yahweh;<WH3068> "and shouldn't<WH5315> my soul be avenged<WH5358> on such a nation as this?<WH1471>
"Go up<WH5927> on her walls,<WH8284> and destroy;<WH7843> but don't<WH6213> make a full end.<WH3617> Take away<WH5493> her branches;<WH5189> for they are not Yahweh<WH3068>'s.
For the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> and the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> have dealt very<WH898> treacherously<WH898> against me,<WH5002>" says Yahweh.<WH3068>
They have denied<WH3584> Yahweh,<WH3068> and said,<WH559> "It is not he;<WH7451> neither shall evil come<WH935> on us;<WH7200> neither shall we see sword<WH2719> nor famine.<WH7458>
The prophets<WH5030> shall become wind,<WH7307> and the word<WH1696> is not in them.<WH6213> Thus shall it be done to them."

Therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Armies,<WH6635> "Because you speak<WH1696> this word,<WH1697> behold,<WH5414> I will make my words<WH1697> in your mouth<WH6310> fire,<WH784> and this people<WH5971> wood,<WH6086> and it shall devour them.<WH398>

Behold,<WH935> I will bring a nation<WH1471> on you from far,<WH4801> house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478>" says<WH5002> Yahweh.<WH3068> "It is a mighty<WH386> nation.<WH1471> It is an ancient<WH5769> nation,<WH1471> a nation<WH1471> whose language<WH3956> you don't<WH3045> know, neither understand<WH8085> what they say.<WH1696>
Their quiver<WH827> is an open<WH6605> tomb,<WH6913> they are all mighty men.<WH1368>

They shall eat up<WH398> your harvest,<WH7105> and your bread,<WH3899> which your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> should eat.<WH398> They shall eat up<WH398> your flocks<WH6629> and your herds.<WH1241> They shall eat up<WH398> your vines<WH1612> and your fig trees.<WH8384> They shall beat down<WH7567> your fortified<WH4013> cities,<WH5892> in which you<WH2007> trust,<WH982> with the sword.<WH2719>
"But even in those days,<WH3117>" says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> "I will not make<WH6213> a full end with you.<WH3617>

It will happen,<WH559> when you say, <WH8478> 'Why has Yahweh<WH3068> our God<WH430> done<WH6213> all these things to us?<WH559>' Then you shall say to them,<WH5800> 'Just like you have forsaken me,<WH5647> and served foreign<WH5236> gods<WH430> in your land,<WH776> so you shall serve<WH5647> strangers<WH2114> in a land that is not yours.<WH776>'
"Declare<WH5046> this in the house<WH1004> of Jacob,<WH3290> and publish<WH8085> it in Judah,<WH3063> saying,<WH559>
<WH8085> 'Hear now this,<WH5530> foolish people,<WH5971> and without understanding;<WH3820> who have eyes,<WH5869> and don't<WH7200> see; who have ears,<WH241> and don't<WH8085> hear:

Don't<WH3372> you fear me?<WH5002>' says Yahweh<WH3068> <WH2342> 'Won't you tremble at my presence,<WH6440> who have placed<WH7760> the sand<WH2344> for the bound<WH1366> of the sea,<WH3220> by a perpetual<WH5769> decree,<WH2706> that it can't<WH5674> pass it?<WH1530> and though its waves toss<WH1607> themselves,<WH3201> yet they can't prevail; though they roar,<WH1993> yet they can't<WH5674> pass over it.'
"But this people<WH5971> has a revolting<WH5637> and a rebellious<WH4784> heart;<WH3820> they have revolted<WH5493> and gone.<WH3212>

Neither do they say<WH559> in their heart,<WH3824> <WH3372> 'Let us now fear Yahweh<WH3068> our God,<WH430> who gives<WH5414> rain,<WH1653> both the former<WH3138> and the latter,<WH4456> in its season;<WH6256> who preserves<WH8104> to us the appointed<WH2708> weeks<WH7620> of the harvest.<WH7105>'
"Your iniquities<WH5771> have turned away<WH5186> these things,<WH2403> and your sins have withheld<WH4513> good from you.<WH2896>
For among my people<WH5971> are found<WH4672> wicked<WH7563> men.<WH7918> They watch, as fowlers<WH3353> lie in wait.<WH7789> They set<WH5324> a trap.<WH4889> They catch<WH3920> men.<WH582>
As a cage<WH3619> is full<WH4392> of birds,<WH5775> so are their houses<WH1004> full<WH4392> of deceit.<WH4820> Therefore they have become great,<WH1431> and grew rich.<WH6238>

They have grown fat.<WH8080> They shine;<WH6245> yes,<WH5674> they excell in deeds<WH1697> of wickedness.<WH7451> They don't<WH1777> plead the cause,<WH1779> the cause of the fatherless,<WH3490> that they may prosper;<WH6743> and they don't<WH8199> judge the right<WH4941> of the needy.<WH34>
"Shall I not punish<WH6485> for these things?<WH5002>" says Yahweh.<WH3068> "Shall not my soul<WH5315> be avenged<WH5358> on such a nation as this?<WH1471>
"An astonishing<WH8047> and horrible thing<WH8186> has happened<WH1961> in the land.<WH776>

The prophets<WH5030> prophesy<WH5012> falsely,<WH8267> and the priests<WH3548> rule<WH7287> by their own authority;<WH3027> and my people<WH5971> love<WH157> to have it so.<WH6213> What will you do in the end of it?<WH319>
